com.appfirst.statsd
Class UDPClient

java.lang.Object
  com.appfirst.statsd.AbstractStatsdClient
      com.appfirst.statsd.UDPClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
StatsdClient
public class UDPClient
extends AbstractStatsdClient
implements StatsdClient

Standard Statsd Client that sends stats thru UDP protocol.

Author:
Yangming Huang

Method Summary
protected  boolean doSend(java.lang.String stat)
          To write a customized client, all you need is to implement this method which sends the stats message to StatsD Server thru your own media.

Method Detail

doSend

protected final boolean doSend(java.lang.String stat)
Description copied from class: AbstractStatsdClient
To write a customized client, all you need is to implement this method which sends the stats message to StatsD Server thru your own media.

Specified by:
doSend in class AbstractStatsdClient
Parameters:
stat - - the formatted message ready to send to the StatsD Server.
Returns:
True if success, False otherwise.
